bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon, removable Carbon Armor, E2 fully integrated tapered head tube, BB95, internal control routing, Micro Truss, balanced post mount, Closed Convert dropouts, G2 Geometry

components.description: Fox Factory Series 32 Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) remote FIT damper, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, Kashima coating, 15QR thru axle, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 100mm travel
Bontrager Race X Lite Tubeless Ready w/Stacked Lacing, 15mm front, 142x12 rear
Bontrager XR0 Team Issue, aramid bead, 29x2.10"
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
FSA IS-2, E2, sealed cartridge bearing
